summary: Adds Eleidon\'s Ward From TESIII: Morrowind into Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Adds Eleidon\'s Ward From TESIII: Morrowind into Skyrim

Shield Can be found in Riften: Black Briar Meadery behind the front bar.

Eleidon\'s Ward has a base armor rating of 72 (Daedric shield of 64) which can be improved at a smithing workbench

Comes enchanted with Fortify Health 100pts.

[INSTALLATION]

Extract .rar using winzip / winrar / 7zip

Copy data folder into skyrim data folder - click yes to merge folder. (nothing should need to be overwritten)

Using skyrim launcher click data files and check \"ward\"

To manually apply plugin - open plugins.txt located in: C:\\users\\[username]\\appdata\\local\\skyrim
	type in \"ward.esp\" and save

[CHANGELOG]

-1.1.0

Higher Quality Texture added
Reflection amount decreased

-1.0.2

Lowered Armor rating from 100 to 72
Lowered Value Of shield

-1.0.0

Initial Release

[CREDITS]

Bethesda
   -for all its TES games
	
Slayer987123
   -Converting TESIII NIF into skyrim
   -texturing Shield using TESIII reference 
   -Testing and Fine-tuning

[PROGRAMS]

BSA Browser
   -Extracting TEIII .NIF for shield shape

NifSkope
   -editing and creating .NIFS    

Cinema4D
   -Transforming .nif UV maps For proper Texturing

Mudbox
   -Actual texturing

TES Creation Kit
   -PUlling everything together in to Skyrim

[UNinstalation]

Uncheck Ward.esp for simple on\\off

Delete Ward.esp 
Delete Ward folders in texture & Meshes \\ armor
author: Slayer987123
